Once there she saw that Shampoo in neko form was already there, and since Ranma neko was not scared of cats, including Shampoo neko, and Shampoo neko was not attacking her, Ranma neko walked up to her.

114.content:
Okay, so here are the choices:

1) Ranma chan gets one of the girls' personality. For example, she becomes like nabiki and become a fiancer in terms of collecting money.

2) Ranma chan would get a new personality. For example she becomes a tomboy or become a schoolgirl that isn't embarrassed to show her body.
114.title: Mental change

choices: Cologne doesn't see Shampoo and Ranma share a second bowl....
Ranma gets caught in a shower as he walks home.
Akane arrives at the Cat Café... and doesn't like what she sees.
1141.content:
The Old Ghoul watched from behind the counter as Ranma downed the last of his noodles. She was always glad for the time that Ranma spent in the Cat Café. Especially as Ranma was enjoying some specially prepared sauce.

The sauce was a secret Amazon recipe, made to help the lesser warrior adjust. To help a woman fit into wifely role. It was seen as a punishment and a disgrace. But a necessary part for some to play to ensure the survival of the village.

It worked rather simply, making a woman's body more sensitive... not so simple as 'The Cat's Tongue', this one was crafted to enhance her sexual appetites too. To make a woman crave the touch of a man.

And she had just watched Ranma finish off a bowl with sauce and gusto. The old ghoul went back into the kitchen, chuckling to herself as she imagined the next time her daughter's fiancée would feel a shirt brush over her nipples, or the embrace of underwear.

There was however a growing pile of unwashed dishes, and she didn't want to interrupt Shampoo and Ranma's time together.

She had her conversation prepared for the inevitable confrontation with the Saotome boy. A dose of the cure, and perhaps as a sweetener, give Shampoo her own taste of the sauce. Cologne didn't like the idea of giving Shampoo something like that, but... well, she had lost to Ranma, so it wasn't ... entirely unfair.

11421.content: How does Ranma's personality become that of a tomboy's?
11421.title: Tomboy

114211.content:
Ranma was being chased by Akane, they ran near the koi pond. Akane had been swinging a bokken at Ranma the whole way, but Ranma had to stop to avoid the pond. While he was changing directions he caught Akane's bokken across the chest, knocking him into the water, he hit his head on a rock near the edge of the water.

"Ranma, Are you okay?" Kasumi asked as Ranma awoke from his sleep.
"I just feel a little light-headed, Kasumi-chan." Ranma replied. Kasumi's eyes widened at Ranma's use of "Chan."
"Are you sure?" Kasumi asked with even more concern that before. "You hit your head pretty hard."
"I'm sure." Ranma said looking into Kasumi's eyes with a smile.
"Say Ranma, what do you think of Akane?" Nabiki asked Ranma from the door.
"She is a good friend, and fun to spar with." Ranma replied now smiling at Nabiki.
"She's not your uncute fiance?" Nabiki questioned, having already reasons to suspect that Ranma was not okay.
"But we're both girls, it would be right for us to wed." Ranma replied her smile straightening.
"But you are betrothed."
"I know, I don't want to marry her. I want to marry a strong, handsome man who is just as strong as me, or even stranger!" Ranma replied.
"Maybe you should get some more rest." Kasumi interjected.
"Sure thing, Kasumi-chan." Ranma said as she sunk back into her futon. Kasumi and Nabiki walked out, their fears confirmed.
"Best tell Otosan and Genma-san." Kasumi said to Nabiki.

<b>How do the two take the news? </b>
114211.title: Ranma hits his head on a rock.

choices: Before the alarm, Ranma woke, dressed and headed out for a training run.
On waking, Ranma picked up the underwear with a certain dread fascination.
As she slept, Ranma's dreams were troubled.
11422.content:
Ranma was sleeping in her usual manner. The sheets were scattered all over the floor, and her top damp. Genma was not tolerant of Ranma kun's snoring... Especially given that Ranma Chan didn't snore, at all.

Unfortunately for the sleeping Saotome's they were not alone. Atop the wardrobe, Happosai opened his eyes taking in the rhythmic shifting of Ranma's impressive chest. He was feeling oddly conflicted. The girls just moved so much more when they were unrestrained. But he truly wanted to see Ranma have to cope with a woman's burden.

In his little nest of stolen panties, he was curled up like a very comfortable cat.

But the temptation proved too much for the old pervert. In a single bound, he landed, right on target. One foot resting atop each breast. Before Ranma could wake ... or protest ... or do anything.

He jabbed her sternum multiple times hitting a variety of pressure points. Ranma's only response was a mewling moan. The moan softened into a gentle sigh. Satisfied that his blows were accurate. He leaped back to his hidey-hole. His landing barely disturbed the wardrobe. Behind him there was a gentle shifting as Ranma's bust settled back to compensate for the now vanished weight.

As Happosai thought about what was going to happen in the morning. He picked out two pieces from his cache. With an indolent swipe he swatted a pair of pink panties to land beside Ranma's sleeping form. It took him longer to select a bra that would fit, but soon a suitable one was drifting down to land beside the sleeping girl.

Happosai's dreams were as ever happy and filled with bounteous girls. He was already imagining Ranma's confusion and compulsions when she woke.
11422.title: Girly girl

choices: Ranma runs into a familiar face
114221.content:
Ranma woke feeling... different. She couldn't quite put her finger on it, but she felt significantly refreshed. Climbing up from her mat, she maneuver around the old man and made her way to the mirror. Her fresh face gazed back at her, smiling a little to herself. She had a good head start on the day, she should go for a run. Sure, her father would have her training soon enough, but there wasn't anything wrong with a little more reasonable exercise. Besides, it was always good to watch her figure. A body like hers required effort in maintaining.

Not noticing the strangeness of her own thoughts, Ranma tied her hair into a ponytail, applied a light blush, and put on her usual running clothes. They were practical and efficient, but she couldn't wait to come back and put on something more flattering when she got home.

She jogged around Nerima easily, enjoying the sights and sounds of early morning. Birds were chirping and a beautiful sunset was just over the horizon. What a lovely way to start the day.
114221.title: Before the alarm, Ranma woke, dressed and heade...

1142211.content:
Satisfied with her run, Ranma took a nice, relaxing shower, washing herself with long lasting shampoo without a second thought.

She wrapped herself with a towel, covering her chest, before approaching the mirror. Hm. She was certainly clean, but now she needed to make sure she looked good. After all, when you were blessed with looks like hers, it'd be a crime not to show them off.

After drying her hair, she returned to her room and combed through her clothes. She needed something that spoke to the kind of person she was. Something that screamed "drop-dead girl who could drop kick you". Something that encapsulated Ranma.
1142211.title: Ranma returns home

Her father was still snoring away when Ranma woke. The Sun was cresting the horizon, gilding the top of the garden fence. A quick sniff confirmed that her sleepwear wasn't suitable for the morning run.

It was then that her eyes spotted the lingerie. Her fingers flinched, snatching the air as she looked at them. The panties were a simple lacy pink arrangement of barely there flowers. Picking them up, they looked far too small to fit even her girl body.

She wanted to drop them, but forgot when she spotted the bra. It was sturdier. Again a similiar shade of pink, with firm support, the upper half of the cups was more decorative, and lined with little roses stitched along it.

Ranma was seized by a perverse thought, a glance at her sleeping father, drooling and snoring confirmed he was out for the count. Silently she stripped naked, and slid the soft panties up her smooth thighs, pressing them into place. She twisted and flexed, admiring her curves, as she posed and pouted.

Her attention returned to the bra in her hands and soon she felt the comforting embrace of the silken cups, lifting and supporting the girls.

It was a nice image, as she admired her reflection... girly and cute... Pink... it wasn't a side she showed often.

Outside it felt like only the birds were awake and about, as they sang their joy to the morning sun.

Ranma spotted a pink jogging outfit, that Nabiki had left unfolded in the corner. Her eyes shifted to her usual running clothes.

Happosai was barely capable of containing his joy as he watched Ranma try to face his compulsions, but in the murk he was invisible.

121.content:
Akane was tired of competing with Shampoo for Ranma's attention, and she set off to China hoping to find a solution to her problems there.

She hated to admit it, but when she noticed how Ranma was around her and around Shampoo, she'd noticed his distracted glances. Even when Ranko was fighting she could be distracted by a jiggle or the shapely outline of a breast.

Akane hated it, and tried to deny it, even to herself, but she was jealous of Shampoo and her curves. Especially when she saw their effect on Ranma. Damn it, she was even a little jealous of Ranko's curves.

The guide lead her to the Cursed Springs, and her temper had cooled by that point. She decided that Ranma was most likely to choose her when she brought him back a bottle from the 'Spring of the Drowned Man'. It was a trick and a tease that she fumed and ground her teeth at, watching Ranma follow her around like a loyal little puppy, begging for a treat.

Unfortunately, she wasn't paying attention to where she was going on the uneven ground. A warning shouted by the guide only made things worse, when she turned around and tripped.

-Splash-

She spluttered angrily to the surface, the jokes and insults for her being clumsy ringing in her ears.

As she struggled to the edge of the pool, the weight of the water pulled at her clothes and shoulders. She reached the road ready to curse out the guide. Who was watching her approach with a stunned expression and an open mouth.

On reaching the road, Akane realised why....

http://fap.to/images/full/44/970/9707266...

She was never going to be insecure about her bust ever again. She would have given a little jump for joy but the threat of two black eyes stopped her.

"Yeah!" Shampoo said with a smile on her face.

Backstory- Shampoo and Cologne are amazons that decided to leave their tribe on good terms and they moved to Nerima without any problems at all. During that time, they first develop feelings for each other and became a couple which since nobody knew of their affairs that made it easier for them. Cologne soon had the idea of having a harem for both of them which her daughter agreed to.

14122112111121.content:
Previous writer, I was almost done with the chapter until you added your piece.

The reality was changed as the glow from the Shampoo's cursed form had caused her to merge with Ranma. As she was fading she was screaming that she would be forgotten.

"Shampoo, you won't disappear because we are becoming one person with the combined intelligence, fighting skills and memories. Hopefully we can be better in the next life together." Ranma said warmly.

Shampoo cried in happiness as Ranma was right and she embraced her friend as they both kissed.

When the light returned to normal, the new Shampoo was looking at herself naked as she saw the improvements that she had still dark purple hair but with light red streaks. Her look was still the same but with bigger breasts and a huge butt.

"I'm loving these improvements, look out world here comes a newly improved Shampoo. But first let's test out something." Shampoo said as she went to the sink and splashed cold water on her face.

She looked in the mirror and was grinning that no changes at all. "Yes, no curses at all." Shampoo said.

"Shampoo dear come over to my room." Cologne said as Shampoo hear her great grandmother's voice.

"Coming great grandmother." Shampoo said with a smile as she seductively walk over to her great grandmother's bedroom.

"What you think of the new me great granddaughter or should I say little sister?" Cologne said as she groped Shampoo's breasts.

"H-How did you look like this?" Shampoo asked.

1413.title: something else happens

choices: Happosai takes a good look at Ranma from head to toe.
Before he can react, Happosai throws water over Ranma.
155.content:
Ranma had been working on his kata in the yard. With one eye kept on the sky, he didn't want to be caught out in a shower. It was just harder to concentrate in his female form.

The moves, just made -her- move more, and less athletically, more jiggly...

He shook his head and headed for the bathroom. He was tired and thirsty after the heat of the bath, and headed to the kitchen for something cooling to drink.

He spotted a carton of milk in the fridge, with a pink bow around, and 'Akane' written on a small tag hanging from the ribbon.

There wasn't anything else there. Kasumi was out doing the shopping, and they would soon have a fridge that needed some empty space. He would be doing them a favour, so he drank the whole carton and tossed the empty into the rubbish.

He went into the living room, and found Akane sitting there watching TV, there was a wide space and on the opposite side sat Happosai, ironing his 'frillies'.

Looking out the window, he saw the first drops of rain as they fell.

He turned to Akane, there was a scowl on her face, and she glowered at the TV. Her eyes threating to burn through it and the wall behind, there was a palm print on Happosai's face too.

Ranma didn't want to add to the situation so, "Akane, I've finished the milk... your milk. But Kasumi will be back with more soon."

However, it was Happosai's head that whipped around to Ranma's words.
155.title: Ranma-kun finishes a training session.

choices: Ranma finds she can't change back.
Happosai bounces off her bounteous chest.
Akane takes it as an insult. "Baka Ranma!"
1552.content:
Happosai's smirk was deeply worrying, and Ranma felt a dread growing in the pit of his stomach. Snatching a glass of water, Happosai threw it across the room. The water sailed free from the glass, as it left, Happosai's smile widening in anticipation.

Ranma leapt to his feet, preparing to avoid the large blob of water. He didn't want anyone glomming onto her bosom. But she just didn't have enough time. He did a backflip out the door, and watched as the water flew over his head.

Landing in the garden, he turned to face his attacker, his tongue already out as an insult and a protest.

But he'd thrown two globs of water. The second hit Ranma before he even saw it coming. He felt the familiar shifting as his body became ... her body.

There was something off, and as she pulled her shoulders back what that was was very obvious.

http://fap.to/images/full/52/586/5866351...

Akane turned away from the TV to complain about the commotion, soon her eyes boggled out at the sight of Ranma-chan standing in the garden. Happi was jumping up and down on the spot, clapping with delight.

"Jiggly goodness." he yelled, before diving towards Ranma.
1552.title: Before he can react, Happosai throws water over...

choices: Epilogue: Ranma & Akane now Goddess of Martial Arts
15523.content:
Akane swings her mallet & it goes through Ranma sending her every where, Happosai disappeared Akane was in shock & Kasumi started picking up pieces of the Ranma Jello putting them in a bowl
after which she then put on the counter with a note then went to contact Cologne while she was gone Genma & his ever empty stomach took it, sprayed whip cream on it & ate what he thought was Jello

A little while later
"Um Father, Auntie, Mr. Saotome did you know what happened to that bowl that was on the counter"

"Sorry Kasumi, I was hungry so I ate it"

"You ate it?"

"Yes again sorry Kasumi"

"No as sorry as your going to be, Panda boy" he looked at he in confussion at the arrival of Cologne

"What she means is because you ignore my sign saying "WARNING: DO NOT EAT, THIS IS RANMA" Genma cut her off with a snort as Nodoka & Soun turned green "So you can make more for the boy"

"You misunderstand that wasn't FOR Ranma it WAS Ranma"

Genma, Nodoka & Soun turned white & Genma started gagging trying to bring up his child to no avail while in Akane's room Akane who was feeling guilty for her hand in Ranma's death commit seppuku
15523.title: Jello Ranma

info.brief_description: transform the ladies of the Ranma-verse, Ranma-chan can change also. Review and add for GP
info.description:
You can do what you want to the Ranma girls, HOWEVER there are exceptions:

No mind control,
Mind altering is fine.
No age reducing.
I will allow endings only if I think the story has gone far enough in that storyline.
It has to be a good ending at least 1 paragraph long
Other then that go wild.

GP for reviews and new chapters
